com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.widgets

Class MyLocationView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.widgets.MyLocationView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class MyLocationView
extends android.view.View
    UI element overlaid on a map to show the user's location.
